PACK.update.new.de-DE: <color:#96a7b2>Ein neues <color:#4bfb00>Update</color> für unser Texturepack ist jetzt verfügbar. Du kannst <aqua><click:run_command:'/loadpack'>hier</click></aqua> klicken, um es dir zu installieren oder einfach den Command <aqua><click:run_command:'/loadpack'>/loadpack</click></aqua> ausführen.</color>
PACK.update.new.en-US: <color:#96a7b2>A new <color:#4bfb00>update</color> for our texture pack is now available. You can click <aqua><click:run_command:'/loadpack'>here</click></aqua> to install it or simply run the command <aqua><click:run_command:'/loadpack'>/loadpack</click>.</aqua></color>

PACK.command.apply.en-US: <color:#96a7b2>The <aqua>texture pack</aqua> has been <color:#4bfb00>successfully</color> downloaded and installed!</color>
